short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds accessibility options to Wizemen (No captcha, Dark Mode, etc.)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a lightweight extension that makes wizemen easier to use.
It adds accessibility options such as:
 - No captcha to login
 - Dark Mode (VERY experimental)
 - Auto login when session expires (if you have remember me checked)
 - Notifications for meetings
 - Auto launch meetings

Features in development:
 - Better Dark Mode

It removes issues users face when using the website, and makes their experience better.
